about_the_game:
World's Goodest Pup is a cozy roguelike deckbuilder where you perform in dog shows! Collect new tricks, groom for stats, unlock breeds, and accessorize at shops as you make your way to the top dog podium. Fluffy, heartwarming runs await in World's Goodest Pup!



Wag and bark your way into the world of dog shows, where strategy, charm, and a little bit of luck are your keys to victory. Start by choosing your companion from a variety of breeds, each with their own unique traits and potential. Through strategic deck-building, you'll train your dog in obedience, agility, and showmanship. Grooming plays a crucial role too, as keeping your pup clean and well-coiffed will surely catch the judges' eyes.



Accessorize with the best items and help power up your pup, from stylish collars to fancy hats. These aren't just for looks—each accessory can provide unique bonuses that might give you the edge in competitions.

As you travel through the city, from small dog park to stadium, assemble different builds to tackle unique situations. Each stage is a chance for you and your pup to bond.

World's Goodest Pup is designed to be a relaxing and positive experience, making it perfect for animal lovers of all ages. Dive into a beautifully crafted world where the competition is friendly, and the focus is on the joy and camaraderie of dog shows.

Features:
  • Endless Replayability: With procedurally generated competitions and challenges, no two playthroughs are the same
  • A Variety of Dog Breeds: Choose from a wide range of breeds, each with unique stats and abilities
  • Artifacts, items, and cards galore: Combine different strategies to adapt to your dog's situation
  • Wholesome Content: A cozy game experience focused on the love of animals
